name: Leopold, the Poison Hoard
description:
The Poison Hoard infects the sky to slowly change air composition. The new air is harmless for any species except humans. It will shorten most human lifespan instead of instantly killing them, avoiding mass hysteria and triggering natural extinction.

Leopold is an AntiMetro; Meta creatures created by Khuzard of the future. They are created to decimate modern human civilizations and let earth begin anew.
